channel.title: Tools on Andrea Raponi
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Andrea Raponi

item.title: WSLSnappy
item.description: I have built a software written in go to create 𝐟𝐚𝐬𝐭, 𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐮𝐬𝐭, and 𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐥 backups of your WSL instances.

item.title: Telly, una delle mie tante idee nel cassetto
item.description: Libcurl, rust e 15 minuti liberi per trasformare una mia esigenza in un command line tool.
